bugs.title: CVE-2018-7587 CImg: Denial of Service (DoS) via crafted BMP image

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2018-7587 CImg: Denial of Service (DoS) via crafted BMP image

long_desc.thetext:
An issue was discovered in CImg v.220. DoS occurs when loading a crafted bmp image that triggers an allocation failure in load_bmp in CImg.h.


References:
https://github.com/xiaoqx/pocs/tree/master/cimg
https://github.com/dtschump/CImg/issues/185

Created CImg tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1552295]

Created gmic tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-27 [bug 1625345]

This CVE Bugzilla entry is for community support informational purposes only as it does not affect a package in a commercially supported Red Hat product. Refer to the dependent bugs for status of those individual community products.

bugs.title: CVE-2018-7588 CImg: heap-based buffer over-read via crafted BMP image in load_bmp in CImg.h

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2018-7588 CImg: heap-based buffer over-read via crafted BMP image in load_bmp in CImg.h

long_desc.thetext:
An issue was discovered in CImg v.220. A heap-based buffer over-read in load_bmp in CImg.h occurs when loading a crafted bmp image.


References:
https://github.com/dtschump/CImg/issues/183
https://github.com/xiaoqx/pocs/tree/master/cimg

Created CImg tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1552297]

Affects: fedora-27 [bug 1625343]

This CVE Bugzilla entry is for community support informational purposes only as it does not affect a package in a commercially supported Red Hat product. Refer to the dependent bugs for status of those individual community products.

bugs.title: CVE-2018-7589 CImg: double free via crafted BMP image in load_bmp in CImg.h

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2018-7589 CImg: double free via crafted BMP image in load_bmp in CImg.h

long_desc.thetext:
An issue was discovered in CImg v.220. A double free in load_bmp in CImg.h occurs when loading a crafted bmp image.


References:
https://github.com/dtschump/CImg/issues/184
https://github.com/xiaoqx/pocs/tree/master/cimg

Created CImg tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1552300]

Created gmic tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-27 [bug 1625341]

This CVE Bugzilla entry is for community support informational purposes only as it does not affect a package in a commercially supported Red Hat product. Refer to the dependent bugs for status of those individual community products.

bugs.title: CVE-2018-7641 CImg: heap-based buffer over-read in load_bmp in CImg.h via crafted bmp image (32 bits colors)

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2018-7641 CImg: heap-based buffer over-read in load_bmp in CImg.h via crafted bmp image (32 bits colors)

long_desc.thetext:
An issue was discovered in CImg v.220. A heap-based buffer over-read in load_bmp in CImg.h occurs when loading a crafted bmp image, a different vulnerability than CVE-2018-7588. This is in a "32 bits colors" case, aka case 32.


References:
https://github.com/dtschump/CImg/issues/185

Upstream Patch:
https://github.com/dtschump/CImg/commit/10af1e8c1ad2a58a0a3342a856bae63e8f257abb

Created CImg tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1552926]

Created CImg tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-27 [bug 1625321]

Created gmic tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1625324]

This CVE Bugzilla entry is for community support informational purposes only as it does not affect a package in a commercially supported Red Hat product. Refer to the dependent bugs for status of those individual community products.

When submitting as an update, use the fedpkg template provided in the next

Please also mention the CVE IDs being fixed in the RPM changelog and the

one tracking bug has been filed, please correct all affected versions at
the same time.  If you need to fix the versions independent of each other,
you may clone this bug as appropriate.

Use the following template to for the 'fedpkg update' request to submit an

this tracking bug.  This will ensure that all associated bugs get updated
when new packages are pushed to stable.

bugs.title: CVE-2018-7588 gmic: CImg: heap-based buffer over-read via crafted BMP image in load_bmp in CImg.h [fedora-27]

bugzilla.short_desc: CVE-2018-7588 gmic: CImg: heap-based buffer over-read via crafted BMP image in load_bmp in CImg.h [fedora-27]

blocked.short_desc: CVE-2018-7588 CImg: heap-based buffer over-read via crafted BMP image in load_bmp in CImg.h

long_desc.thetext:
An issue was discovered in CImg v.220. A heap-based buffer over-read in load_bmp in CImg.h occurs when loading a crafted bmp image.


References:
https://github.com/dtschump/CImg/issues/183
https://github.com/xiaoqx/pocs/tree/master/cimg

Created CImg tracking bugs for this issue:

Affects: fedora-all [bug 1552297]

Affects: fedora-27 [bug 1625343]
